sentences.en: He put on his underwear and got into his suit.
sentences.cn: 他穿好内衣，然后穿上西装。

sentences.en: Her mother disapproves of her wearing transparent underwear.
sentences.cn: 她母亲不赞成她穿透明的内衣.

sentences.en: Never dry underwear over direct heat; it will weaken the fabric.
sentences.cn: 不要直接加热烘干内衣，那样会损坏布料。

sentences.en: She packed one change of underwear.
sentences.cn: 她打行李时带了一套换洗的内衣。

sentences.en: She put the envelope beneath her underwear in the bureau, a place Richard would never look.
sentences.cn: 她把信封放在梳妆台抽屉的内衣下面, 这里理查德是决不会看的地方.

sentences.en: The flattening of underwear with pleasure is the job of the chambermaid.
sentences.cn: 带著喜悦地叠内衣是女服务生的工作.

sentences.en: The sergeant lay in his dirty long - sleeved underwear.
sentences.cn: 军曹躺在那儿,只穿着一件脏了的长袖内衣.

sentences.en: They left off their woolen underwear when the weather got warm.
sentences.cn: 天气暖了,他们脱去了羊毛内衣.

sentences.en: They left off their woollen underwear when the weather got warm.
sentences.cn: 天气转暖的时候,他们不再穿羊毛内衣.

sentences.en: Underwear is the major product of the export busine.
sentences.cn: 其中内衣出口是公司的主营业务.

sentences.en: Wacoal supplies underwear of diversified styles and releases special offers every quarter.
sentences.cn: 款式多样的华歌尔内衣,更推出当季特惠商品.

sentences.en: What kind of goods do you want, knit goods, sportswear, T shirts, or underwear?
sentences.cn: 你要哪一类货物, 针织品 、 运动衫 、 T恤还是内衣裤?

sentences.en: Who comes to a cocktail party with their underwear hanging out?
sentences.cn: 有谁这样衣冠不整来参加鸡尾酒会?

sentences.en: You just need to take a change of underwear.
sentences.cn: 你只需带一套换洗的内衣。

trans.tran_en: clothes that you wear next to your body under your other clothes
